services.hero_desc_1: STEALTH leads the digital transformation of businesses based on the latest technology stack and rich experience.
services.hero_desc_2: From planning to deployment, we provide professional development solutions with the highest quality and speed.
services.ai_desc: We support strategic AI adoption for business intelligence. From utilizing the latest Large Language Models (LLM) to custom AI modeling and data analysis, we provide next-generation solutions that enhance corporate competitiveness.
services.ai_check_1: Enterprise LLM construction and service integration
services.ai_check_2: Deriving business insights based on machine learning
services.web_desc: We build high-performance custom web applications to achieve business goals. We provide optimal solutions with excellent scalability and maintainability using the latest frameworks.
services.web_check_2: SEO optimization and enhanced search engine visibility
services.mobile_desc: We develop high-performance mobile applications that work seamlessly in both iOS and Android environments. We ensure native-level performance and intuitive usability.
services.mobile_check_1: Store registration support and service launch management
services.mobile_check_2: Optimization of push notifications and external API integration
services.uiux_desc: We create beautiful and easy-to-use designs based on user-centered thinking. We provide precise UX design for high conversion rates and user satisfaction.
services.blockchain_desc: We support the development of DApps using Ethereum-based Solidity and exchange-type wallets such as BTC, ETH, XRP. We provide technical capabilities for a safe and transparent Web3 ecosystem.
services.blockchain_check_1: Smart contract development and security audit
services.blockchain_check_2: Construction of NFT minting sites and marketplaces
services.cta_desc: You can just bring your idea. STEALTH takes responsibility for the successful digital implementation of your business until the end.

step1.title: Select Project Type
step1.hero_desc: Please select the type closest to the service you are preparing. A customized quotation process will proceed according to the selected type.

step2.title: Project Details
step2.budget_title: Please select an estimated budget range
step2.timeline_title: What is your desired development period?

step2.requirements_placeholder: Example: Please freely write down the core features of the project, benchmarking services you want to refer to, preferred design mood, etc.
step2.disclaimer: The information entered will be used only for review for partnership establishment.

step3.title: Final Step
step3.hero_desc: A dedicated manager will contact you based on the information provided.
step3.privacy_agree: (Required) I agree to the collection and use of personal information.
step3.secure_msg: The information entered is safely protected.
step3.success_alert: Your quote inquiry has been successfully received.\nA manager will check and contact you quickly.
step3.privacy_policy_content:
1. Purpose of Collection and Use of Personal Information
STEALTH collects minimal personal information for customer inquiries and service provision.

2. Items of Personal Information Collected
- Required: Name, Email, Phone Number, Company Name
- Information generated during service use: Access logs, cookies, access IP information, etc.

3. Retention and Use Period of Personal Information
Personal information of users is destroyed without delay once the purpose of collection and use is achieved. However, if retention is required by relevant laws, it is retained for a certain period.

4. Right to Refuse Consent
You have the right to refuse consent to the collection and use of personal information. However, if you refuse consent, there may be restrictions on counseling and service use.
step3.terms_service_content:
Article 1 (Purpose)
The purpose of these Terms is to prescribe the terms and conditions and procedures for using the website and related services provided by STEALTH.

Article 2 (Effect and Change of Terms)
1. These Terms become effective by posting on the service screen or by notifying the user by other means.
2. STEALTH may revise these Terms if necessary to the extent that it does not violate relevant laws.

Article 3 (Use of Service)
1. Users must comply with these Terms and relevant laws.
2. STEALTH does its best to provide stable service, but may temporarily suspend all or part of the service if necessary, such as system maintenance.

Article 4 (Disclaimer)
STEALTH is not responsible for damages caused by force majeure such as natural disasters or service maintenance.

2.title: Samsung Electronics Maestro AI Service
2.desc: Samsung Electronics integrated AI solution platform for next-generation service interworking and intelligent data processing based on AI.

3.title: Mobis Proactive AI Simulator
3.desc: Hyundai Mobis AI simulation platform that proposes and tests proactive scenarios based on real-time vehicle status data.

4.title: Smart Logistics Platform Construction & Operation
4.desc: Visibility-oriented enterprise smart logistics integrated management platform supporting real-time logistics tracking, inventory management, and transport optimization.

5.title: Canon Korea MPS System Development
5.desc: Integrated MPS (Managed Print Service) system for printer and MFP management. Provides real-time monitoring, automatic consumable management, and efficient printing environment.

6.title: China Local Influencer Auto-Matching Platform
6.desc: Marketing platform connecting Chinese Xiaohongshu influencers and brands with AI-based matching. Supports efficient entry into the Chinese market with 100% online process.

7.title: AI Subtitle Generation Platform
7.desc: Intelligent content production support platform that automatically generates and edits subtitles using voice recognition technology.

8.title: Children's Golf Game UI&UX
8.desc: Intuitive and fun golf game interface design for children. Provides motion recognition-based character selection and intuitive gameplay experience.

9.title: RMS Platform CITY EARTH Control System
9.desc: Intelligent service robot integrated control platform for urban infrastructure and building management. Provides real-time robot status monitoring, job scheduling, and data analysis dashboard.

10.title: CJ E&M BDP System Improvement
10.desc: User interface and data visualization improvement of Entertainment Big Data Platform (BDP). Enhanced data query speed and user-centric simulation functions.

11.title: CultureIt Game Music Production Platform
11.desc: Web-based DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) system where users can easily produce and edit game music. Provides note editing, virtual instrument integration, and real-time statistics.

12.title: LG Uplus U2 Drive Development
12.desc: Enterprise cloud storage and collaboration platform. Provides large file management, sharing permission setting, team collaboration drive functions with a modern interface and efficient file management system.

13.title: PCN FISS System Development
13.desc: Intelligent facility management system (FISS) for Busan Metropolitan City facilities and track management. Provides map-based real-time location tracking, facility detailed information inquiry, and maintenance management functions.

14.title: AB Works Golf Swing 3D Analysis Development
14.desc: AI-based 3D golf swing analysis system. Analyzes user's swing video in real-time to provide professional data such as posture correction, distance measurement, and club path optimization.

15.title: KT AICE Platform UI&UX Improvement
15.desc: User experience (UX) and interface (UI) advancement of KT AICE certification education and test platform for AI talent cultivation. Design improvement for learning convenience and professionalism enhancement.

16.title: KT Integrated Advertising Platform Development
16.desc: Development of KT's integrated advertising platform that manages various advertising media and provides optimized advertising effects. Provides user-customized targeting and real-time performance analysis functions.

17.title: LG Uplus Collaboration Platform Service
17.desc: Development of LG Uplus collaboration platform for smooth team collaboration and project management. Provides real-time document sharing, video conferencing, and work progress tracking functions.

18.title: Obigo Infotainment Cabin Service Development
18.desc: Cabin service development for in-vehicle infotainment systems. Enhances user experience by providing personalized content, entertainment, and convenience features.

22.title: Hyundai Rotem SRS Digital Maintenance Platform
22.desc: Integrated platform for digital maintenance of Hyundai Rotem. Supports efficient operation of railway systems by providing core functions such as real-time device monitoring, fault diagnosis, and parts management.

21.title: Golden Tree Investment Advisory Website
21.desc: Your Financial LIFE Partner, Golden Tree BlackRock EMP Service. A financial platform offering intuitive investment portfolio management and customized asset design solutions.

23.title: SeedGrow Web Page UI/UX Improvement
23.desc: UI/UX renewal for global logistics platform SeedGrow to improve user experience. Usability enhanced through intuitive dashboards and optimization of purchasing agency processes.

24.title: SeAH Steel Groupware Publishing
24.desc: Efficient groupware publishing for SeAH Steel employees. Internet work efficiency increased through user-friendly interface and web standard compliance.

25.title: TCC Steel HMI Factory Automation System
25.desc: HMI (Human Machine Interface) control system for TCC Steel factory automation. Maximized production efficiency through real-time process monitoring and control functions.
